General.Name: Shandong Dongyue Organosilicon Mat
General.Description: Shandong Dongyue Organosilicon Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of silicone materials in China, the United Arab Emirates, the United States, Belgium, Germany, India, South Korea, and internationally. Its principal products include silicone rubbers, silicone oil, silicone resins, fumed silica, other silicone downstream deep processed products, organic silicon intermediates, etc. Shandong Dongyue Organosilicon Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Zibo, China.

0.Name: Mr. Weidong  Wang
0.Title: Chief Exec. Officer and Member of Board Of Directors
